name: Montreal Elixir Meetup
description:
We're looking for presenters for the October meetup.  Do you have a side project using Phoenix or OTP?  Have you built something cool lately?  Please share!  

If you would like to present, checkout out the Presentation Guide in the community playbook (https://github.com/montrealelixir/playbook/blob/master/guides/presentations.md)and get in touch with us. We are looking forward to seeing everybody in October.
